rule: The output should be enclosed in curly braces '{' and '}' instead of square brackets.
input: Abstract: Discusses the impact of AI on society.
validityText:
The input begins with "Abstract: ", which complies with the first requirement of the input specification. Following this, the text discusses a topic ("the impact of AI on society"), which could be appropriate content for an abstract of a machine learning paper. The input does not require model names to be mentioned, so the absence of those names doesn't violate the specification. The text is in English, and there is no specification regarding the minimal length. There is no non-compliance identified based on the provided specification. Therefore, the input complies with all rules and conditions outlined in the input specification.

No violation.
